library.name: A Comprehensive Bibliography on Syriac Studies

bib: “[Review of:] W. Cureton, The Third Part of the Ecclesiastical History of John Bishop of Ephesus (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1853); R. Teubner, 1858).” The Quarterly Review 117 [233] (1865): 150–79.
